item.title: 特朗普呼吁房利、房地刺激建筑业是个 "谜
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统最近在社交媒体上发帖，呼吁抵押贷款巨头房利美（Fannie Mae）和房地美（Freddie Mac）促进住宅建设，这给本已在努力应对市场停滞和建筑成本上升的行业带来了混乱。【原文：President Donald Trump’s recent social media post calling for mortgage giants Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac to boost homebuilding is sowing confusion in an industry already grappling with a stalled market and higher construction costs.】

item.title: 华尔街陷入停滞，亚洲股市表现低迷：市场综述
item.description: 华尔街股市在连续创下历史新高后稍事喘息，亚洲股市将低迷开盘。【原文：Asian stocks are set for a sluggish open after Wall Street shares took a breather from notching a series of all-time highs.】

item.title: 安大略省教师正在回归老派私募股权投资
item.description: 安大略省教师退休金计划（Ontario Teachers' Pension Plan）的一位高级投资主管表示，该计划正在调整其部分私人投资团队的工作重点，以回归其经营公司以获取利润的本源。【原文：Ontario Teachers’ Pension Plan is refocusing part of its private investment team to return to its roots of operating companies to drive profit, according to a top investment executive.】

item.title: 诊断公司BillionToOne不顾停业申请美国IPO
item.description: BillionToOne Inc. 提交了美国首次公开募股申请，成为第二家在美国政府停摆的情况下推进上市计划的著名医疗保健公司。【原文：BillionToOne Inc. filed for a US initial public offering, becoming the second notable health-care company to advance public listing plans despite the US government shutdown.】

item.title: 日本央行上田陷入加息两难境地，高市将成为领导者
item.description: 日本央行行长上田一夫（Kazuo Ueda）从周四开始的五年任期的后半段可能将面临更加严峻的政治环境，因为批评加息的执政党领袖佐佐江隆一（Sanae Takaichi）获胜了。【原文：Bank of Japan Governor Kazuo Ueda will likely face a tougher political environment in the second half of his five-year term starting Thursday after the ruling party leadership victory of Sanae Takaichi, a critic of interest rate increases.】

item.title: 新行长上任，泰国央行有望降息
item.description: 泰国央行新任行长威泰-拉他那空（Vitai Ratanakorn）可能会主持今年的第四次降息，旨在重振因泰铢坚挺和消费价格下跌而陷入困境的经济。【原文：New Bank of Thailand Governor Vitai Ratanakorn is likely to preside over the country’s fourth interest rate cut this year, aiming to revive an economy struggling with a strong baht and falling consumer prices.】

item.title: Thoma Bravo 在需求旺盛的情况下敲定 55 亿美元 Dayforce 贷款
item.description: 本周二，Thoma Bravo 敲定了一笔 55 亿美元的债务交易，这笔交易将为其收购人力资源软件供应商 Dayforce Inc.【原文：Thoma Bravo finalized a $5.5 billion debt deal that will help fund its pending acquisition of human-resources software provider Dayforce Inc. on Tuesday, after receiving strong investor demand to buy up the financing.】

item.title: 瑞银称信贷市场疲软暴露出日益严重的脆弱性
item.description: 上个月，整个信贷市场的发行量激增，而周一投资级市场的一个关键恐慌指数收于年内最低水平。但在表面之下，瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）的策略师们看到了裂痕的形成。【原文：Issuance boomed across credit markets last month, while a key fear gauge in the investment-grade market closed at its lowest level the year on Monday. But beneath the surface, UBS Group AG strategists see cracks forming.】

item.title: 新堡垒公司波多黎各天然气交付在争端中面临风险
item.description: 波多黎各的一名法官命令新堡垒能源公司停止使用其租用的拖船向圣胡安湾码头交货；迫使一些发电厂转而使用更昂贵、更脏的柴油。【原文：A judge in Puerto Rico ordered New Fortress Energy Inc. to stop using the tugboats it hired to make deliveries to its San Juan Bay terminal — forcing some power plants to turn to more expensive and dirtier diesel.】

item.title: 认识佐佐江-高市，有望打破日本 "玻璃天花板 "的民粹主义者
item.description:
高市真奈的领导能力对日本经济意味着什么，以及为什么一些日本人对这位即将成为日本首位女首相的女性的政治表现并不满意。【原文：

What Sanae Takaichi’s leadership could mean for Japan’s economy, and why some Japanese aren’t thrilled about the politics of the woman set to become the nation’s first female prime minister.

】

item.title: Porta Potty 公司 United Site 在谈判中获得宽限期
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Platinum Equity 支持的便携式厕所公司 United Site Services Inc. 在选择不支付部分债务利息后，正根据一项暂缓偿还协议开展业务。【原文：Platinum Equity-backed portable toilet company United Site Services Inc. is operating under a forbearance agreement after it elected to skip interest payments on some of its debt, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 富时将越南从前沿市场升级为新兴市场
item.description: 越南首次被一家主要指数编制公司列为新兴股票市场，这有可能吸引更多数十亿美元的资本流入。【原文：Vietnam received its first classification as an emerging equity market from a major index compiler, potentially attracting billions of dollars more in capital inflows.】

item.title: 乌拉圭将主要利率降至 8.25%，未来将进一步放宽政策
item.description: 乌拉圭央行意外地将基准利率下调了半个百分点，降至 8.25%，这要归功于通胀温和以及消费者价格预期下降。【原文：Uruguay’s central bank unexpectedly lowered its benchmark interest rate half a percentage point to 8.25%, thanks to tame inflation and falling consumer price expectations.】

item.title: 高盛为 21 亿美元 Versant 分拆贷款寻找买家
item.description: 据知情人士透露，高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. is holding early discussions with investors to gauge their interest in a roughly $2.1 billion leveraged loan tied to Comcast Corp.’s planned spinoff of Versant Media Group Inc., according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 被困特斯拉：车门造成的恐慌
item.description:
当特斯拉失去动力时，事故就会变成致命的时间竞赛。【原文：

Cuando los Tesla pierden energía, los accidentes pueden convertirse en carreras mortales contra el tiempo.

】

item.title: 美联储停摆为前景蒙上阴影，债券交易员加大对冲力度
item.description: 美国政府停摆所造成的数据空白正促使债券交易商对冲美联储在今年剩余的两次会议中的一次会议上暂停的风险，或可能提供比市场预期更多的宽松政策。【原文：The data void created by the US government shutdown is pushing bond traders to hedge against the risk that the Federal Reserve pauses at one of its two remaining meetings this year, or potentially delivers more policy easing than the market anticipates.】

item.title: 墨西哥集团排除对花旗银行旗下 Banamex 的更高出价，考虑 IPO
item.description: 由墨西哥矿业巨头 German Larrea 领导的墨西哥集团（Grupo Mexico SAB）表示，该公司无意参与花旗集团旗下 Banamex 公司的竞购战，并暗示如果目前的收购要约成功，该公司未来将公开上市。【原文：Grupo Mexico SAB, the conglomerate led by Mexican mining magnate German Larrea, said it has no interest in getting into a bidding war for Citigroup Inc.’s Banamex unit and hinted at a future public listing if its current offer succeeds.】

item.title: 被人工智能颠覆的求职网站 CareerBuilder 完成清算
item.description: 前招聘网站 CareerBuilder 和 Monster 的所有者将其倒闭归咎于人工智能，他们向贷款人和其他债权人支付了不到 10% 的欠款，从而赢得了法院批准，结束了清算案。【原文：The owner of former job recruitment sites CareerBuilder and Monster, which blamed artificial intelligence for their demise, won court approval to end a liquidation case by paying lenders and other creditors less than 10% of what they are owed.】

item.title: 摩根大通称稳定币的采用有望推动美元买盘
item.description: 摩根大通（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：The global adoption of stablecoins may drive trillions of inflows into the US dollar in the years ahead, even as estimates of future demand for the digital asset vary widely, according to JPMorgan Chase & Co.】

item.title: OpenAI、Nividia 通过一系列循环交易助推价值 1 万亿美元的人工智能市场
item.description:
交易和合作的浪潮正在加剧人们的担忧，即万亿美元的人工智能热潮是由相互关联的商业交易支撑起来的。【原文：

A wave of deals and partnerships are escalating concerns that the trillion-dollar AI boom is being propped up by interconnected business transactions.

】

item.title: Salesforce 告诉客户不会向黑客支付数据勒索费
item.description: 彭博新闻社（Bloomberg News）看到的一封电子邮件显示，Salesforce 公司周二告诉客户，它不会支付一名黑客索要的赎金，这名黑客声称窃取了大量客户数据，并威胁要公布这些数据。【原文：Salesforce Inc. told customers Tuesday that it won’t pay a ransom demand from a hacker who claimed to have stolen a large amount of client data and threatened to publish it, according to an email seen by Bloomberg News.】

item.title: 瑞银搁置与 25 亿美元贷款相关的风险转移交易
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）已经搁置了一项与 20 亿法郎（约合 25 亿美元）贷款相关的重大风险转移交易。【原文：UBS Group AG has shelved a significant risk transfer transaction tied to 2 billion francs ($2.5 billion) of loans, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美国消费者借贷增速为六个月来最慢
item.description: 受信用卡余额下降的抑制，8 月份美国消费者借贷增长速度为六个月来最慢。【原文：US consumer borrowing rose in August at the slowest pace in six months, restrained by a pullback in credit-card balances.】

item.title: 自民党选举结果公布后，日元跌至 2 月以来最弱水平
item.description: 由于佐佐江-高市（Sanae Takaichi）出人意料地当选日本执政党自民党的新领导人，日元兑美元汇率周二继续下滑，触及二月份以来的最弱水平。【原文：The Japanese yen extended its slide Tuesday, touching the weakest level since February against the dollar as Sanae Takaichi’s surprise win as the new leader of Japan’s ruling Liberal Democratic Party continued to weigh on the domestic currency.】

item.title: 3 年期国债拍卖需求旺盛，国债涨幅扩大
item.description: 国债周二上涨，在本月首次票息拍卖吸引了强劲需求后，国债延续了小幅上涨。【原文：Treasuries rose Tuesday, extending a modest advance after the first coupon auction of the month drew strong demand.】

item.title: 梅洛尼告诉 Rai1，意大利银行应为预算做出贡献
item.description: 意大利总理乔治亚-梅洛尼（Giorgia Meloni）表示，银行将不得不再次为意大利的预算做出贡献。【原文：Prime Minister Giorgia Meloni said banks will once again have to contribute to Italy’s budget.】

item.title: 美国鸡肉价格从夏季峰值下跌 18
item.description: 在牛肉价格飙升期间，美国人听信了一句口头禅，确实吃了更多的鸡肉，家禽生产商因此赚得盆满钵满。现在，鸡肉价格下跌可能会使这一涨势终结。【原文：As Americans heeded a catchphrase and indeed ate more chicken during a beef spike, poultry producers raked in profits. Now, falling chicken prices may be bringing that rally to an end.】

item.title: 斯塔默誓言与欧盟进行关税谈判，英国钢铁行业发出危机警告
item.description: 在欧盟提议提高关税以保护本国濒临崩溃的钢铁行业后，英国钢铁行业警告称可能面临生存危机。【原文：The UK’s steel sector warned of a potentially existential crisis after the European Union proposed raising tariffs to shield its own ailing sector.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长拉加德表示欧盟机构希望法国找到预算路径
item.description: 欧洲中央银行行长克里斯蒂娜-拉加德（Christine Lagarde）表示，各机构正在观察法国的政治危机，希望政府能找到通过预算的办法。【原文：European Central Bank President Christine Lagarde said institutions are observing France’s political crisis and hope a government finds a way to adopt a budget.】

item.title: 银行储备减少，美联储资产负债表缩水成焦点
item.description: 就在美联储持有的银行储备不断减少的同时，美国货币市场的长期融资压力表明，央行可能越来越接近于结束其大规模证券投资组合的平仓。【原文：Prolonged funding pressures in US money markets, just as bank reserves held at the Federal Reserve are dwindling, suggest the central bank may be getting closer to ending the unwinding of its massive portfolio of securities.】
